task.title: Reversing the Car
task.shortdesc: Safely reverse the car by following a precise sequence of clutch and pedal operations.

prereq.p: Ensure the car has come to a complete stop before attempting to reverse.

step.cmd: Bring the car to a full stop.
Disengage the clutch using the hand lever.
Press the reverse pedal forward with your left foot.
Keep your right foot free to use the brake pedal if necessary.

info.note: Do not pull the hand lever back too far, as this will engage the rear wheel brakes.

result.p: The car is now in reverse and ready to move backward.

ul.li: Hold the clutch pedal in neutral with the left foot
Operate the reverse pedal with the right foot
